name: Jugular
tagline: BIG IDEAS DO NOT COME FROM WITHIN THE COMFORT ZONE
description:
Jugular is a creative boutique communications and social media agency. We specialize in smart ideas that deliver an unfair share of attention and market.
Our goal is to differentiate you from your competitors. In meaningful, relevant ways. We're very good at figuring out what makes you unique and we know how to create work with the stopping power to make people notice you.
